titleStmt.title: Verses spoken at the appearance of the King and Queene, Dvke and Dutchesse of York in Christ-church Hall, Oxford Sept. 29, 1663 By Th. Ireland ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland, Thomas, Sir.
Laurence, Thomas, 1645?-1714. Verses spoken to the King, Qveen, and Dutchesse of Yorke.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hall for R. Davis ...,

notesStmt.note: Portrait of Charles II engraved by A. Hertochs inserted as frontispiece.
Verses spoken to the King, Qveen, and Dutchesse of Yorke in St. John's library in Oxford, attributed to T. Lawrence. 4 p. at end; half t.p. before main t.p.
Imperfect: Portrait of Charles II and t.p. for Verses spoken to the King, Qveen, and Dutchesse of Yorke are lacking on film.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
